mapper.select: SELECT m.id AS member, p.contents, m.nickname, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM recommend JOIN novel ON novel.code=recommend.novel GROUP BY recommend.novel, novel.member HAVING novel.member=#{member}) AS recom, n.code, n.title, g.contents AS genreContents FROM member m LEFT OUTER JOIN profile p ON m.id=p.member JOIN novel n ON n.member=m.id JOIN genre g ON g.code=n.genre WHERE m.id=#{member};
